title: "Walgreens Find Care, Music Health collab on ‘music detective’ app to trigger memories in dementia patients"
excerpt: "Walgreens Find Care announced Thursday that it is partnering with Music Health, a music therapy company, to provide people living with dementia with an app that gives them a “personalized soundtrack” aimed at triggering long-lost memories."
